customer

Class SeatSelectionCtrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • customer.SeatSelectionCtrl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SeatSelectionCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This is the controller class of the seat selection page. The user here has already selected a combination of Movie-Day-Time and this page shows the available seats to book The user can select 1 or more seats to book but of course they can't select a pre-booked one
    Author:
    Dimitris Selalmazidis

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        This method is initializing the seat selection page. It reads from the database for a given combination of movie-day-time and populates the grid with buttons If a seat is booked then the color if the button is red and the user cannot interact with it. Otherwise, the user can click any button to select a seat
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • confirm

        public void confirm(javafx.event.ActionEvent Event)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method initializes the booking process. It checks that the customer has clicked a seat,calls the updateDatabase method and moves to the confirmation page
        Parameters:
        Event -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
